p: As one of the immediate early proteins, ICP0 has many biological functions. Some studies found that HSV-1 ICP0 mutant viruses might yield avirulent progeny, suggesting that ICP0 plays a pivotal role during lytic and latent infection [ 36, 37]. However, according to our results, MD had no effect on the promoter activity of ICP0, which suggests that MD interrupts the transcription of viral immediate early genes without affecting the promoter activity of ICP0. It is still an interesting future direction to examine the promoter activities of other immediate early genes to explore the precise molecular mechanism of action of MD against HSV-1.
